Interface EntitiesResult

The important people, places, geopolitical entities and other types of entities in your content.

Hierarchy

  • EntitiesResult

Properties

Optional count

count: number
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:402

How many times the entity was mentioned in the text.

Optional disambiguation

disambiguation: DisambiguationResult
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:408

Disambiguation information for the entity.

Optional emotion

emotion: EmotionScores
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:404

Emotion analysis results for the entity, enabled with the "emotion" option.

Optional mentions

mentions: EntityMention[]
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:400

Entity mentions and locations.

Optional relevance

relevance: number
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:398

Relevance score from 0 to 1. Higher values indicate greater relevance.

Optional sentiment

sentiment: FeatureSentimentResults
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:406

Sentiment analysis results for the entity, enabled with the "sentiment" option.

Optional text

text: string
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:396

The name of the entity.

Optional type

type: string
  • Defined in natural-language-understanding/v1-generated.ts:394

Entity type.
